changeSet.createView: select distinct USER_NAME, APPLICATION_NAME, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_ID, SCOPE_ID, FEATURE_NAME, CATEGORY, DISCRIMINATOR from ( select uf.USER_NAME, uf.APPLICATION_NAME, uf.ROLE_NAME, uf.ROLE_ID, uf.SCOPE_ID, uf.FEATURE_NAME, d.CATEGORY, d.DISCRIMINATOR from ACTIVE_USER_FEATURE_V uf, SCOPE_DATASET_T sd, DATASET_T d where sd.SCOPE_ID=uf.SCOPE_ID and d.DATASET_ID=sd.DATASET_ID union select uf.USER_NAME, uf.APPLICATION_NAME, uf.ROLE_NAME, uf.ROLE_ID, uf.SCOPE_ID, uf.FEATURE_NAME, NULL as CATEGORY, NULL as DISCRIMINATOR from ACTIVE_USER_FEATURE_V uf where uf.SCOPE_ID is null ) foo
